/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with wispy clouds scattered across it. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A few cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the life and activity in the area. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the greenery contrasting beautifully against the blue sky.
